  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109284</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109284</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tyre cross-sections</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reifenquerschnitte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sections transversales de pneu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cross-sections do tyre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sezioni trasversali del pneumatico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διατομές ελαστικών αυτοκινήτου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Secciones representativas del neumático</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show cross-sections of a correctly inflated tyre (left), a front tyre upon braking (middle) and a rear tyre upon breaking (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">braking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Cars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cross-sections</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tyres</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen Querschnitte eines 
richtig aufgeblähten Reifens (nach links), des vorderen Reifens nach 
dem Bremsen (Mitte) und des hinteren Reifens nach dem Brechen (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent des sections 
transversales d'un pneu correctement gonflé (à gauche), d'un pneu 
avant en freinant (milieu) et d'un pneu arrière lors de la rupture 
(droite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram cross-sections de um 
tyre corretamente inflado (à esquerda), de um tyre dianteiro em cima 
de frear (meio) e de um tyre traseiro em cima de quebrar (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano le sezioni 
trasversali di un pneumatico correttamente gonfiato (a sinistra), di 
un pneumatico anteriore sul frenaggio (metà) e di un pneumatico 
posteriore sul rompersi (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν διατομές ενός σωστά
διογκωμένου ελαστικού αυτοκινήτου (αριστερά), ενός μπροστινού 
ελαστικού αυτοκινήτου επάνω στο φρενάρισμα (μέση) και ενός 
οπίσθιου ελαστικού αυτοκινήτου επάνω στο σπάσιμο (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran secciones 
representativas de un neumático correctamente inflado (a la 
izquierda), de un neumático delantero sobre frenar (centro) y de un 
neumático posterior sobre romperse (derecho).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bremsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Autos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Querschnitte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reifen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
